artist: Ange-Laurent de La Live de Jully
title: Vue en Perspective du Chateau de la Briche, from a recueil of etchings
marks:
Signature, Title and Inscription

LRC, in pencil LLC, in the plate: [Dupin de Franceuil pinx.]; LRC
description: view of a chateau at R, with small garden in front and rows of trees at L; figures in a boat on a canal in LLC; two figures and two dogs in front of chateau
creditline: Gift of funds from Janet and Winton Jones and John E. Andrus III
